episode34.name: 33   Texas A&M, Kentucky, and Martrell Spaight
episode34.description: We talk about the hogs hot start and slow finish against Texas A&M as well as the lopsided loss in Lexington. We also talk some bracketology and look at the final 2 regular season games. We were honored to have Martrell Spaight join us for a segment on the show. We talked about the hogs transition with Robb Smith, his time at the combine, the draft, and even look forward to the hogs 2015 season.
